title: Virtual Simulation-Based Fundamental Nursing Skills and Clinical Reasoning Enhancement Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic anatomy and physiology knowledge, foundational nursing science
context.additional_context: Establishing alternative learning environments using virtual simulation technology under COVID-19-induced clinical practice restrictions

learning_goals: Learners can perform basic nursing skills (blood pressure measurement, injection administration, etc.) with 90% accuracy via virtual patient scenarios.
Learners can analyze patient data collected in a virtual environment and make clinical judgments with 80% accuracy.
Learners can propose priorities for four or more nursing interventions through simulation-based discussion activities.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
